FuncDef: This command allows restricting MVPN instance per PE node to a specific role. By default, MVPN instance on a given PE node assumes the role of being a sender as well as receiver. This creates a mesh of MDT/PMSI across all PE nodes from this PE.

ParaDef.Info: MVPN has both sender and receivers connected to PE node.
MVPN has only senders connected to PE node.
MVPN has only receivers connected to PE node.
